title: I can't use the bluetooth or scan to send the file between the phones.
content:
I try to send files to another Device I can't send  it's doesn't improve anything. Everytime want to send a pics or some document have to send it's to an Applications,sms and  mms. And Even I bought new phone it's been just the same  on recovery mode when you buy it's 2 days ago, broken links, Display problem,And Google keep telling me it's wasn't the phone I had. So I try to fix it manyways but it's not improved at all.
Can anyone tell me pleaseüôè What's happened because this happened all the same to all my phones. Include this Samsung Galaxy A20 I just bought it's nit long ago and went to Samsung Centre already this afternoon. But it's just keep me entering to G-Suiet site. Which it's not connected to my old e-mail account yet. 
Sorry for none Document to show because just come out feom the service centre.
